file_content.text: Thanks to your efforts, Taris will soon be a burning wasteland--a testament to Sith power.
First you decimated the rakghouls, now the Cathar too. Such talent must be unleashed on the Republic base... immediately.
Excellent work dealing with our rakghoul problem. The Republic should never have interfered with matters beyond their control.
The Republic's making a stand in the old sewer system. We must crush their pathetic operation to proceed.
Speak to Melkor Dinn at our outpost. Help him slay the sewers' mutated denizens and drive out the Republic. And watch out for Thana. I doubt she'll welcome seeing you.
Go. Wreak your destruction across Taris.
Orda's finished. I defeated him, then had Thana bring him in for questioning.
He'd better prove useful.
I killed Orda. Thana was out cold for the entire fight.
The Republic will be shaken by his death.
Thana contacted me after your skirmish. She was eager to report the details of her bloodbath.
But despite her best efforts, you've killed more Republic soldiers. Such carnage deserves recognition.
Always glad to serve, my lord.
A good weapon and fresh Republic prey: the only ingredients for fun you'll ever need on Taris.
I knew I would best Thana.
Confidence will serve you well on Taris.
Unfortunately you've failed to top her body count. You're lucky she isn't here to gloat.
Rather than rack up kills, I focused on my main target.
I was busy dealing with Orda.
I expect bodies, not excuses. But in this case, your decision paid off.
If she were here, I'd teach her who's the better fighter.
Thana's the lucky one.
In that case, I'm glad she's on the loose.
Let's move on.
With Orda dispatched, I can finally focus the Empire's might on demolishing this wretched planet.
This may be our only chance to defeat Orda. Don't disappoint me.
We must coordinate our assault with the walkers' destruction. Report to Major Nost at once.
Once Orda's walkers are destroyed, we can assault the commander himself.
You're leaving quite the mark on Taris.
If only Thana were here to observe your swift victory.
I'm back. And I brought a friend.
He's one of Orda's guards. I had some fun with him. Wasn't until I killed his buddies that he finally talked.
I could have broken him in half the time.
You were too easy on him.
Maybe, but I like to draw the torment out. Really savor the agony.
The Force is the key to unlocking true pain.
Physical damage isn't enough.
There are more delicate ways of extracting information.
I know better techniques.
Pain twists the truth. He'd say anything to avoid your torment.
Torture is foolish.
Your weak stomach will get you nowhere on Taris.
Well, what did he say?
One well-aimed blaster shot, and he'd tell you his life story.
I could do better.
My methods made him scream just fine.
Go on, officer. Spill your story. And no whimpering this time.
Commander Orda--he's got walkers hidden near his base. They'll ambush anyone who attacks. That's all I know--please release me!
Okay, okay! The walkers can't be detected by probes. Only Orda's top operatives have the coordinates, and they're encoded.
Is this the best you could find, Thana? A lowly officer with secondhand information?
He's all we need, master. I'll attack Orda's base myself and rip those walkers apart!
Take them out before we attack. Then Orda will be defenseless.
Sabotage the walkers first.
Sneaking around won't do us any good!
On the contrary, Thana. We must crush Orda's walkers before storming his base.
This battle's not for amateurs. Watch how a master dismantles those walkers.
Back off. This is my fight.
Don't even think about it. I'm due some carnage.
We'll see who's more qualified to take down Orda, but first, we cripple his walkers.
They'll blast you to pieces.
Don't underestimate my power.
Don't overestimate it either, Thana. If you hope to face Orda, we must cripple his walkers first.
We'll find them by slaying his operatives for their coordinate codes. His men have gunned down many Imperials, so don't hold back.
With the coordinates, our bomber squadrons will decimate the walkers.
Orda's toys will soon be in flames.
I'll ensure their destruction.
I can't wait to feel the aftershocks.
Sounds fun. Count me in.
Thank you. Such a mission demands only the best. Thana--wait here and train for our assault against Orda.
If you want my help, keep your apprentice locked up.
I won't work with Thana.
As you wish. Thana, stay here. Continue your training while we wait to assault Orda.
Good plan. I may even help.
If it makes any difference, you'll be taking on this mission alone. Thana--stay here, prepare for the coming fight.
No! I've wasted enough time enslaved to you, Gravus! Enjoy your new pet!
And my apprentice breaks her leash. Thana's strength with the Force is magnificent, but she's only focused when prodded into a rage.
And I see she's abandoned her poor friend. We'll have to dispose of him.
Wait! Please don't hurt me! I--I told you everything I know!
I'll put in a good word for you with Orda.
Thanks again. [Kill him]
Let's hope all Republic forces on Taris are so pathetic.
Trade him to the Republic for their captives. In the meantime, don't rough him up.
Swap him for Imperial POWs.
Hmm, a fine idea. He'll make a good bargaining chip.
Kill the operatives, then hand their coordinates over to Major Nost--the head of Imperial Bomber Command. He's already stationed at our outpost.
I look forward to hearing of the walkers' destruction.
The Cathar won't bother you any more. I wiped out their weapons.
I hope they don't perceive your distaste for bloodshed as Imperial weakness.
The Cathar's fighting days are over.
Let their deaths be an example to those who would try to rebuild Taris.
The Cathar have made dangerous friends. Punish them.
Welcome back. I'll need you and Thana for our next strike.
We must focus our power to bring down the Republic's military leader--Kom Orda. He commands a battalion set to drive us off Taris.
Only the weak flee.
Sith never retreat.
We'll occupy Taris until the very end.
The Empire never retreats.
That is why we will win. But first, we must strip Orda of his strength.
Not even an army can shove me off.
I never retreat.
I wouldn't have approached you if I thought otherwise.
Crack the foundation of Orda's attack. It's the best way to stop him.
We must break his offensive.
No time for that. I'll attack the Republic weakling and end this standoff.
No, Thana--Orda is too strong. Stripping him of his battle resources is just the path to take.
How is Orda my problem?
Orda is strangling our destruction of Taris. You must help bring him down, before it's too late.
Republic troops are in short supply this far from the base, so Orda's been arming Cathar settlers to attack us.
The Cathar beasts are vicious enough without Republic weapons. They must be neutralized.
The Cathar won't survive the day.
Consider them dead.
You'll mess the job up. I will lead the massacre.
There's no need to kill everyone. Destroying the Cathar's gun stores will render them harmless.
I'll dismantle their weapons.
If you're not up for the bloodbath, leave it to me.
No, Thana. Your failure with the artillery has earned you a secondary assignment.
As you wish... master.
Remove this Cathar threat. Then we'll be one step closer to Orda's defeat.
The Republic artillery is in pieces, Darth Gravus.
I hope you enjoyed yourself.
The Republic infestation is slowly rebuilding Taris. Left untreated, we'll be faced with a military staging point and symbol of Republic fortitude.
Join me, and we'll ensure that Taris never falls to the Republic!
I'll gladly join you.
A wise decision.
Is there pay involved?
Help me destroy Taris, and you'll be well-compensated.
You leave me little choice.
Victory on Taris is essential to the Empire's success throughout the galaxy.
I'm back, master. I slaughtered every one of them, then crushed their artillery.
A fascinating story. Unfortunately, the true destroyer of the artillery stands before you. Thana Vesh, meet the latest addition to my circle.
Your deception has failed, my apprentice. The true destroyers of the artillery stand before you. Thana Vesh, meet my latest recruits.
Hunt in my territory again, and you're dead.
We're all friends of the Empire here.
Restrain yourself.
Taris is big enough for both of us.
Take it easy.
Don't lecture me.
Rage really brings out your beauty.
[Flirt] Anger becomes you.
I'm immune to your sickening charms.
Is it my superior skills that make you uncomfortable or that I can actually look good using them?
Jealous?
Go ahead. Let's see what you can do with that lightsaber.
Take your best shot.
That's it!
Save your anger, Thana.
The Republic's artillery is giving me a headache. Destroy them... quickly.
No one sees Darth Gravus without authorization.
